Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka » 13.12 Rūpāvacaraduka » 13.12.1 Paṭiccavāra » 13.12.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 13.12.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu-naārammaṇa
Piṭṭhiduka
Rūpāvacaraduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu-naārammaṇa
230.
4586Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ narūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe…  (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
4587Naārammaṇapaccayā…  tīṇi.
<< 13.12.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāraup Naadhipatyādi >>
